title: Requires notice of risk of deportation of non-citizens, prior to accepting plea to a misdemeanor or violation
summary: Requires courts, prior to accepting a plea to a misdemeanor or violation, to provide notice to the defendant that such plea and the acceptance thereof could result in deportation, removal from the United States, exclusion from the United States or denial of citizenship, if the defendant is not a citizen of the United States.
